name: My World Still Burns
description:
My World Still Burns is a Promare fan game created for the second anniversary of the movie's premier.  Happy Promareversary!

Life on the run has not taught Lio Fotia the first thing about domesticity, laundry or cooking.  Still, that won't keep him from creating the World's #1 Dinner for his second anniversary with Galo Thymos.  Lio used to lead the Burnish in their fight against oppression, surely he can manage one simple meal!  Meanwhile, Galo has planned an anniversary surprise of his own...

This game contains spoilers for the movie Promare. 

🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺

Features
🔥 Over 9k words (roughly 30 minutes to an hour depending on speed)
🔥 Humorous and sweet story
🔥 A fire safety song

Future Plans
In order to release this in time for the anniversary, I had to leave a few planned features out of the game.  However, the plot of the game is still 100% complete and playable!
🔥 CGs not yet completed
🔥 Artbook
🔥 And more....?

🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺

Credits
Story/Art/Code cloverfirefly
Additional Code npckc

🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺

This game is released as pay-what-you-want.  If you enjoyed, please consider leaving a donation!  All money goes toward Lio's future cooking lessons.
